cause.description:
ABOLISH THE AMERICAN PRESIDENCY
BESTOW THE EXECUTIVE POWERS ON THE LEGISLATIVE BRANCH
THE AMERICAN PRESIDENCY IS THE CHIEF HINDRANCE TO DEMOCRACY IN THE U.S.
THE AMERICAN PRESIDENCY AS CURRENTLY CONSTITUTED IS UNCONSTITUTIONAL.
1. THE AMERICAN PRESIDENCY IS THE CHIEF HINDRANCE TO DEMOCRACY IN THE U.S.
2. THE AMERICAN PRESIDENCY, AS CURRENTLY CONSTITUTED, IS UNCONSTITUTIONAL.
cause.name: ABOLISH THE AMERICAN PRESIDENCY
